ic.overview.title: Welcome!
ic.overview.summary:
Welcome to the App Store Demo study.

Before we begin, we want to tell you about the study and your participation.

If you are under 18, please go through this with your parent.
ic.overview.content:
Welcome to the App Store Demo study.

In this app you will have access to the tasks and exercises of the App Store study. Before we begin, we want to tell you about the study and your participation.

If you are under 18, please go through this with your parent.
ic.who.title: Who are we?
ic.who.summary:
This study is conducted by researchers at the Technical University of Denmark.

The main contact person is professor Jakob E. Bardram
ic.who.content:
PROJECT TEAM

This research is done by the Copenhagen Center for Health Technology (CACHET) at the Technical University of Denmark (DTU).

The investigators directly working with this study include: 

 - Professor Jakob E. Bardram from DTU.

PROJECT FUNDING

This study is funded by the Copenhagen Center for Health Technology (CACHET), which again recieve funing from a range of funding bodies.
ic.tasks.title: Study Tasks
ic.tasks.summary: For the next weeks, there will be tasks and questions for you to complete every day as part of the study.
ic.duration.title: Duration
ic.duration.summary: You may participate in this study as long as you want.
ic.duration.content:
If you or your child need help with emotional problems or other health issues, please contact your regular healthcare provider. 

If you need help with using the app or the wristband, please contact us directly.
ic.data.title: Data Management
ic.data.summary:
This app collects data in accordance with GDPR.

Access to data is restricted to the project's researchers and will not be shared with third parties.
ic.data.content:
DATA HANDLING

Your personal data is processed in compliance with the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). The Technical University of Denmark, CVR no. 30060946, is the data controller responsible for personal data in this study. Identifiable data can only be accessed by the researchers affiliated with this project. Information will not be shared with your case worker, but you are welcome to share study information with your case worker. 

DATA STORAGE

No data is stored on your smartphone, only processed using a pseudonym so that your information is not linked to your identity. All communication between your smartphone and our server is encrypted. All server-side services, including web applications, can only be accessed by authenticated and authorized users. The data is encrypted and hosted on servers within EU.

You can get a digital copy of the data being collected about you in this study by contacting the principle investigator.
ic.location.title: Location
ic.location.summary: This study collects location and uses the location service on the phone.
ic.location.content:
This study collects location data.

We ask you to enable the location service on the phone by allowing tracking of location 'Always'. The location service will keep the app running in the background, which helps us collec the data.

We use the location data in our subsequent data analysis. in order to calculate how much time you spend at home, for example.
ic.rights.title: Rights & Withdrawing
ic.rights.summary: Participation should be voluntary and harmless. You are free to stop using the app at any time.
ic.rights.content:
If you are interested in receiving the research results, you can request them from the project team. You can also get a copy of this consent.


PARTICIPANT'S RIGHTS

We are not aware of any major risks or safety issues associated with the participation in this study. If your child is a patient, and suffers injuries due to the research project, you can apply for compensation under the Patient Insurance Act.

The ethics committee of the Capital Region of Denmark approved the WristAngel study (journal number: H-18010607-79689).

Your participation is voluntary, and you are free to withdraw your consent at any time, without providing a reason. Doing so will have no adverse effect on your legal rights. We will contact you to ask for your consent if we ever need to use your survey data for a similar study.

If you like, you can choose to have your data deleted after the study or if you withdraw early. You can also receive the results of the surveys once the research is complete if you contact us by e-mail. The compensation you receive for using this app is what you receive for the study overall.

CONTACT

The main contact person is Senior Scientist Nicole Nadine Lønfeldt, CAMHS Bispebjerg: rhp-fp-wrist-angel@regionh.dk
ic.summary.title: Summary
ic.summary.summary: You are above 18 years old. You have read and understood the provided information, your rights and that your participation is voluntary.
ic.summary.content:
You are above 18 years old.

If you are not, please go through this with your parent.

You have read and understood the provided information.

You understand your rights: your participation is voluntary, and you are free to withdraw at any time.

You understand and agree with how your data is collected, stored and used.
ic.review.title: Informed Consent
ic.review.reason: Have you read, understood and agreed with using this app for the study as explained?
ic.completion.title: Thank you!
ic.completion.text: We have saved your consent document.
study.description.title: CARP App Store Study
study.description.purpose: To provide a simple demonstration of how the CARP Study App can be configured.
study.description.description: We would like to have you help in testing the technical stability and the usability of the CARP Mobile Sensing app.
study.responsible.name: Jakob E. Bardram
study.responsible.title: Professor
survey.who5.title: WHO Well-Being Index
survey.who5.description: A short 5-item survey on your well-being.
survey.who5.more_half: More than half of the time
survey.who5.less_half: Less than half of the time
survey.who5.instructions.title: WHO Well-Being Index
survey.who5.instructions.description:
Please indicate for each of the following five statements which is closest to how you have been feeling over the last two weeks. Notice that higher numbers mean better well-being.

Example: If you have felt cheerful and in good spirits more than half of the time during the last two weeks, select the box with the label 'More than half of the time'.
survey.who5.question.1: I have felt cheerful and in good spirits
survey.who5.question.2: I have felt calm and relaxed
survey.who5.question.3: I have felt active and vigorous
survey.who5.question.4: I woke up feeling fresh and rested
survey.who5.question.5: My daily life has been filled with things that interest me
survey.who5.completion.title: Finished
survey.who5.completion.description: Thank you for filling out the survey!
survey.demographics.title: Demographics
survey.demographics.description: A short 3-item survey on your background.
survey.demographics.smoke.1: Current smoker (less than once a day)
survey.demographics.question.smoke: Do you, or have you, ever smoked (including e-cigarettes)?
reading.title: Reading
reading.description: In this small exercise we would like to collect sound data while you are reading.
reading.instructions:
Please read the following text aloud.

Many, many years ago lived an emperor, who thought so much of new clothes that he spent all his money in order to obtain them; his only ambition was to be always well dressed. He did not care for his soldiers, and the theatre did not amuse him; the only thing, in fact, he thought anything of was to drive out and show a new suit of clothes. He had a coat for every hour of the day; and as one would say of a king 'He is in his cabinet,' so one could say of him, 'The emperor is in his dressing-room.'
wound.title: Wound Healing
wound.description: In order to follow your wound healing, plase take a picture.
wound.instructions:
Please take a picture of the wound.

Sit down confortably and place the body part with the wound on a flat surface like a table. Make sure that the wound is completely visible and that there is sufficient light. Turn on the light above the table, if needed. If you are haing difficulties in taking the picture youself, please as your spouse or frind to help you take the picture.
environment.title: Local Environment
environment.description: Collect information about the local weather and air quality,
